messages: dd645dc2e489d8d6015dd173a3f9c682 (23:49): How do you get vim to display a percentage of how far into a file you are?
4969e383a78d3407b54160eb0de4b90b (23:50): Probably fiddle with the ruler format
fa555b3a23ef939721f2510503d95b83 (23:58): Hi, I know there has to be a way to do this... I want to insert a filename in the text autocomplete style
fa555b3a23ef939721f2510503d95b83 (00:03): jamessan: I love you... that's exactly what I needed :D
dd645dc2e489d8d6015dd173a3f9c682 (00:20): Is there some way to add an option to your .vimrc without opening the file and adding a line for it
dd645dc2e489d8d6015dd173a3f9c682 (00:20): and it would add it to .vimrc and then set the option or maybe re-read the .vimrc file
ded01cf47cdca62f9adcfd25cb1b3127 (00:20): how would vim know where to stick it?
fb2c4f3e688db2a676f292cd15961a59 (00:23): you can try :mkvimrc -- no guarantees.
fb2c4f3e688db2a676f292cd15961a59 (00:23): and you should _really_ read :he settings    before trying
dcfc5b5134f4fc3b718ab15c2f0e1001 (00:31): As Salaam e laikum (meaning: May Peace b on u) . http://www.submission.org/ ... Your source for Islam (submission) on the internet.
